attributes.action: Create more grammar schools and give bright children a chance to achieve their potential.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Legislation does not allow new grammar schools but does allow schools to become partially selective by aptitude but not by ability.  This means that students can be assessed/tested by how 'sporty' they are or how good they are at 'the arts' or 'languages' but when it comes to academic ability it appears this 'skill' is not important enough to provide a specialist education.  There are only 163 grammar schools left.  Lets give our bright children a chance and secure our future.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Create more grammar schools and give bright children a chance to achieve their potential."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14670.asp
